name: Isabella Lovestory
description:
'''Isabella Rodr√≠guez Rivera''' (born 30 November 1993), known professionally as '''Isabella Lovestory''', is a [[Hondurans|Honduran]] [[Pop music|pop]] and [[reggaeton]] singer based in [[Montreal]], Canada. Her music has been described as ''[[perreo]]''-pop.

In 2020 Lovestory gained recognition with the release of her single ''Mariposa''. She released ''Amor Hardcore'', her first full-length studio album, in 2022, followed by her second full-length album ''Vanity'', in 2025. Lovestory has collaborated alongside numerous other artists like [[Shygirl]], [[Mura Masa]] and [[La Goony Chonga]].
